name: Sunfire Aegis
simpleDescription: High armor. Constantly deals damage to nearby enemies. Immobilize enemies to release a wave of damaging flame

passives.name: Immolate
passives.effects: Taking or dealing damage activates this passive for 3 seconds. Deal 20 (+ 1% bonus health) magic damage magic damage every second to enemies within icononly = true 325 (+ 100% bonus size) units, with the damage being increased by 50% against minions and monsters. This executes minions that would be killed by one more tick of damage.
